00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 #include "namespaces.h"
00011 
00012 int findEnumID(MavenCompiler* c, int namespaceID, string enumName) {
00013         // enum name is allowed to be in the form namespace.enumName
00014         StringList parts = split('.', enumName);
00015         if(parts.length() > 1) {
00016                 namespaceID = findNamespaceID(c, parts[0]);
00017                 enumName = parts[1];
00018         }
00019         
00020         if(namespaceID < 0) return -1;
00021         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).enums.size(); ++i)
00022                 if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).enums[i].name == enumName)
00023                         return i;
00024         return -1;
00025 }
